mapper.insert: insert into user_order (order_id, payment_transaction_id, user_id, order_time, total_amount, paid_amount, status, pay_url, pay_time, cancel_time, finish_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{orderId}, #{paymentTransactionId}, #{userId}, #{orderTime}, #{totalAmount}, #{paidAmount}, #{status}, #{payUrl}, #{payTime}, #{cancelTime}, #{finishTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update user_order set status = #{status}, payment_transaction_id = #{paymentTransactionId}, pay_time = #{payTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} where order_id = #{orderId} and status = "pay_wait"
mapper.select: select id, order_id, payment_transaction_id, user_id, order_time, total_amount, paid_amount, status, pay_url, pay_time, cancel_time, finish_time, create_time, update_time from user_order where user_id = #{userId} order by id desc limit 1
